short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Non-Custodial wallet for Stratis, Cirrus, NFTs and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CoinVault allows management of funds, NFTs and more on the Stratis and Cirrus blockchains. Giving users a quick and easy to use wallet that can be created and used in just a few seconds.
